ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was
What is your overall assessment of this course
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I was able to improve my skills in chemistry and discover how much chemistry plays a role in our daily lives.
I learned a lot of the important themes in chemistry and how it is connected to our daily lives in so many ways.
I got to know the mechanism of green-house gases and methods available to protect the earth.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Sometimes, I feel as if by going by the textbook, it limits what we can learn. Thus, I wouldn't have minded if we learned something not from the textbook once in a while.

The course covered a lot of material, which was a positive and negative thing. I learned a lot from it but it was also very fast paced and hard to follow sometimes. It could be improved by slowing the course down a bit when needed. The demonstrations were very helpful in understanding concepts.
I think this course is perfect for students enrolled in summer session.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, I would. However, I would recommend it for students who are need of an introductory course in chemistry or need a refresher of chemistry topics.

Yes,  but only if you have a solid background in chemistry. There are no prerequisites for the course, but the instructor does expect you to know some chemistry before hand. My lack of a chemistry background caused me to struggle in the course.
Sure. I thing the professor of this course was kind and knowledgeable, and I still remembered my joy and happiness this course gave me.
